argument.name: window_name
argument.description: The name of the window whose handle you wish to get.

page.description: Get window of a program, alpha five window five is no window specified.
page.discussion: SYS_ID_GET() obtains the Window_Handle of a program that is identified by its Window_Title. Limitations: Desktop applications only.

section.title: Example
section.description: Obtain the window handle for the Notepad application window.
